resources.string: Like the maps and examples? Learn how to include them in your app!
While other categories in this app present examples doing one specific thing, the lab category combines examples to show the power of the SDK.
Mapbox Java Services bundles many of the Mapbox APIs into a single SDK such as directions, geocoding, and many of the other utilities offered.
Examples here show how to query the map data to obtain information such as a features geometry or properties.

Have you allowed the location permission for this app? To check, go to the Location section in the navigation sidebar and select the \"Show a user\'s location\" example. If you\'re not asked to enable it, then the permission is already enabled. Go to your device\'s home screen and add this app\'s widget. Add it to your home screen and you should see the address of your device\'s location appear.
No place name associated with this location.
